Articles.Content:
So, I was trying to dock a station today...

I was controlling the module. SAS was on both of the module and station.

When I spun the module, the station began spinning. When I stopped the module, the station stopped. When I turned around, the station turned around.

I was not docked to the station, and this bug made it impossible to dock.
If you have any screenshots, those tend to help a HUGE amount
See the Cross Platform Issues Thread: Controlling all craft within physics range.
